          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Isomers produced from the electrophilic substitution in methylbenzene</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Isomere produzierten aus dem elektrophilen Ersatz 
im Methylbenzol</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les isomères ont produit à partir de la 
substitution électrophile en méthylbenzène</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os isomers produziram da substituição 
electrophilic no methylbenzene</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Gli isomeri hanno prodotto dalla sostituzione 
elettrofila in metilbenzene</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ισομερή που παράγονται από την ηλεκτρονιόφιλη 
αντικατάσταση methylbenzene</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los isómeros produjeron de la substitución 
electrophilic en methylbenzene</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows three different isomers that might form following the electrophilic substitution of the nitronium ion for one hydrogen atom in methylbenzene.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">1-methyl-2-nitrobenzene</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">1-methyl-3-nitrobenzene</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">1-methyl-4-nitrobenzene</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">chemical bonds</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">chemical reactions</string>
          </keyword>

            <string language="en">electrophiles</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">electrophilic substitution</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">hydrogen atom</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">isomerism</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">isomers</string>
          </keyword>

            <string language="en">methylbenzene</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">nitration</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt drei unterschiedliche 
Isomere, die das Folgen des elektrophilen Ersatzes des nitronium Ions 
für ein Wasserstoffatom im Methylbenzol bilden konnten.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre trois isomères 
différents qui pourraient former suivre la substitution électrophile
de l'ion de nitronium pour un atome d'hydrogène en méthylbenzène.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra três isomers diferentes 
que puderam dar forma a seguir a substituição electrophilic do íon 
do nitronium para um átomo do hidrogênio no methylbenzene.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra tre isomeri differenti 
che potrebbero formare quanto segue la sostituzione elettrofila dello 
ione di nitronium per un atomo dell'idrogeno in metilbenzene.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει τρία διαφορετικά ισομερή
που να διαμορφώσουν μετά από την ηλεκτρονιόφιλη αντικατάσταση 
ενός ατόμου υδρογόνου με το nitronium ιόν methylbenzene.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra tres diversos isómeros
que pudieron formar el siguiente de la substitución electrophilic del
ion del nitronium para un átomo del hidrógeno en methylbenzene.</string>
          </description>
